02: vmapper setting overview.SYNTAX:
echo " mitm=$(ps | grep -e de.goldjpg.vmapper -e com.mad.pogodroid | awk -F. '{ print $NF }') | Vmapper=$(dumpsys package de.goldjpg.vmapper | grep versionName | head -n1 | sed 's/ *versionName=//') | VMscript=$(grep '# version' /system/bin/vmapper.sh | awk '{ print $NF }') VM_Autoupdate=$([ -f /sdcard/disableautovmapperupdate ] && echo disabled || echo enabled) " && awk -F'["]+' '/value/{print "VM_"$2 "=" $4}' /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml |tr '
' ' ' && awk -F'[<>"]+' '/string/{print "VM_"$3 "=" $4}' /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml |tr '
' ' '

05: migrate to v2.SYNTAX: su -c 'mount -o remount,rw /system && /system/bin/curl -L -o /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper -k -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dkmur/vmconf/v2/55vmapper && chmod +x /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper && mount -o remount,ro /system && reboot'

12: experimental vhook: enable (reboot i.SYNTAX: vmconf="/data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml" && sed -i 's,"betamode" value="false","betamode" value="true",g' "$vmconf" && chmod 660 "$vmconf" && vmuser=$(ls -la /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/|head -n2|tail -n1|awk '{print $3}') && chown "$vmuser":"$vmuser" "$vmconf" && reboot

13: experimental vhook: disable (reboot.SYNTAX: vmconf="/data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml" && sed -i 's,"betamode" value="true","betamode" value="false",g' "$vmconf" && chmod 660 "$vmconf" && vmuser=$(ls -la /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/|head -n2|tail -n1|awk '{print $3}') && chown "$vmuser":"$vmuser" "$vmconf" && reboot
